name: ONLINE BATTLE CARDS (Mini Jam 69)
description:
Mini Jam 69 was a 72 hour game jam with 2 guidelines in place:

  • The theme was Hell, but didn't need to be heavily incorporated
  • The limitation was that the game had to use cards, so I made a card game!

This game is based on Club Penguin's Card Jitsu game, and is fully networked. Feel free to play against friends, or against the AI!

I did all the code, implementation, and art, and then I used free assets from the bundle for racial justice for sound + music. Networking is handled by Photon, and may be limited to users in the US (apologies if that's the case! Feel free to hit my twitter if you need help connecting: @Tauvalian).

There are a few unfinished features, and most likely a bit of debug code sitting in the build, so you may have to tiptoe around these things to avoid desyncs when playing with your friends!
